summary:
☑ As a Learning and Performance Sr Manager and Sales Specialist with oncology, immuno-oncology, targeted therapy, companion diagnostics (CDx), rare disease, orphan drug, oncology medical benefit (injection, infusion medication) and specialty pharmacy (in-office dispensary, oral medication) experience, I use the extensive network of industry connections that I have developed over the past 17+ years to remain in the top 15% of the sales force and most recently to support successful product launches as a training manager, including a virtual launch in Multiple Myeloma. 

LEADING LAUNCH EXCELLENCE ACROSS KEY ACCOUNTS AND INSTITUTIONS

☑ Award Winning Training and Sales Professional

CONSIDER THE FOLLOWING EXAMPLES: 

 ►Member of the VP Sales Field Advisory Board at Tesaro GSK, an elite, elected position, 2018 to 2019.

►I’ve joined strategic planning sessions with sales leadership and led regional workshops during the 2018 National Sales Meeting while working for PUMA.

►Hand-picked for Celgene’s Marketing Advisory Committee.

GIVING BACK TO THE COMMUNITY

☑ As a seven-year breast cancer and recently diagnosed melanoma cancer survivor, I found a way to give back to the community by helping cancer patients understand how to advocate for themselves with their medical team. This unique perspective and shared experience allows me to make a positive difference in their lives and those of the families that support them. 

☑ A previous Board Member of the Oregon Cancer Foundation, I participated in the Bras for a Cause fundraiser every year since 2015. I was the Breast Friends Gala Procurement team Chair in 2015 and utilized my nutrition background and training to serve as a nutrition expert for a Survivorship Class.

☑ I’d love to connect, to discuss the industry, possible opportunities, or anything else. 

Oral Medication, Cross Functional Collaboration, Rare Oncology, Immuno-oncology, Specialty Pharmacy, Patient Pull Through
